forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 56. North wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As you ease into the early hours of this Wednesday, expect a comforting embrace of clear skies and a mild breeze wafting through the air—a promise of tranquility painted across the view from the hills. The night settles gently, with temperatures expected to rest around the pleasant 56 degrees, while the wind, modestly whispering from the north, adds a subtle chill that invites a light jacket. 

As the sun rises, illuminating the vibrant cityscape, it will rise high, nudging the day toward a comfortable warmth, reaching near 73. The golden rays will dance across downtown San Francisco, inviting you to stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps enjoy a quiet moment in one of the city's many picturesque parks. With the warmth peaking in the late morning before gently cooling to about 70 degrees in the afternoon, it's a perfect time for layered clothing—perhaps a light sweater paired with a breathable shirt, making room for comfort whether you find yourself stopping for coffee or basking in sun-dappled corners of the city. The absence of fog means today's vistas will be crystal clear, transforming the iconic Golden Gate Bridge into a magnificent sight against a backdrop of endless blue. Enjoy the day outside—it holds the promise of simple pleasures in abundant clarity.
